articles.title: Google says attackers used 100,000+ prompts to try to clone AI chatbot Gemini - NBC News
articles.description: Google says its flagship AI chatbot, Gemini, has been inundated by “commercially motivated” actors who are trying to clone the chatbot.

articles.title: Samsung Display Intros “QD-OLED Penta-Tandem” Premium Technology Brand - Wccftech
articles.description: Samsung announced its new QD-OLED Penta-Tandem premium technology brand for its proprietary five-layer organic light-emitting structure.

articles.title: Mario Tennis Fever 1.0.1 update out now, patch notes - Nintendo Everything
Highguard’s developer reportedly lays off ‘most’ of its staff just over two weeks after launch - The Verge
articles.description: Highguard developer Wildlight Entertainment has laid off “most of the team,” according to a former staffer on LinkedIn. Highguard launched in late January.

articles.title: Blizzard Is Bringing The Warlock Class To Diablo IV: Lord Of Hatred, Diablo II, And Diablo Immortal - Game Informer
articles.description: You can play as the Warlock in Diablo II starting today as part of the new Reign of the Warlock DLC.

articles.title: Dangerous new spyware can take full control of iPhone and Android devices - TechSpot
articles.description: Security firm iVerify says it has uncovered a new spyware platform dubbed ZeroDayRAT, a tool designed to seize near-total control of a compromised smartphone. According to the...
